document_data.name: Treeclaw Lizard
document_data.mainbody: '''Treeclaw lizards''' were a species of [[lizard]] endemic to the [[Khopet-Dag]] mountains of the [[Hordelands]].
document_data.Description: These lizards had mottled brown scales, with a small horn on their noses{{cite book/Sentinelspire||4}}

Ecology.Diet: Treeclaw lizards fed mainly upon [[spider]]s.{{cite book/Sentinelspire||10}}
Ecology.Usages: The [[yaqubi]] people of Khopet-Dag raised treeclaws as guard animals, though they became unreliable in the rain.

document_data.Notable Treeclaws: * [[Pech]], a treeclaw lizard that was an [[animal companion]] of the [[druid]] [[Berun]].{{cite book/Sentinelspire||1}}
